#Text=WAR AND ART
#Text=THIS war is going to have a tremendous in- fluence on Art -- vitalize it , you know , and make it REAL , and all that sort of thing .
#Text=In fact , it 's doing it already .

#Text=We took up the war last night -- our Little Group of Serious Thinkers , you know -- in quite a serious way and considered it thoroughly in all its aspects and we decided that it would put more SOUL into Art .
#Text=And into life , too , you know .
#Text=Already you can see it on every hand how much serious purpose it is putting into lives that were merely trivial before .
#Text=Even poor , dear Mamma -- and really , it would be hard to imagine a more trivial person than Mamma ! --
#Text=is knitting socks .
#Text=She is going to send them to the Poles .
#Text=She wanted to send them to the Belgians .
#Text=But I said to her , " Positively , Mamma , you are ALWAYS behind the times .

#Text=Do n't you know the Belgians are going out and the Poles are coming in ?

column1: #Text=And another said , " One of them shows intellect obviously mingled with spirit , but the other shows spirit occultly mingled with intellect . "
#Text=Fothergil Finch said , " They are alike in their differences , but subtly differentiated in their likenesses , n'est-cd pas ? "
#Text=Fothy has a simply delightful faculty of summing a thing up in a sentence like that , but it makes him very vain if you show you think so ;
#Text=so I put him in his place and closed the discussion with one remark :
#Text=" It is all , " I said , " it is ALL a question of Interpretation . "
#Text=And , quite seriously , when you come to think about it , it usually is , is n't it ?
#Text=A SPIRITUAL DIALOGUE
#Text=Last night
#Text=I met Hermione , And eagerly she said to me : " Thoughts from the ambient everywhere Electrify our worldly air . "
#Text=" My soul , " I said , " grabs off such hints As butter , whether pats or prints , Receives and holds all unaware Small strands of drifting , golden hair .

#Text=It 's simply wonderful the way Old things grow new from day to day !

#Text= That 's true , " I said , " I often ape The Ape to get my Art in shape -- And with the Simian going strong , Behold , another Rennysawng ! "

column1: #Text=" Perhaps , " she said , " across the verge Of darkness , from the Cosmic Urge , The Light is speeding in bright waves , E'en now to show the way to slaves ! "
#Text=" The thought , " I said , " is cheerful -- but These Swamis WILL chew betel-nut ! "
#Text=" Alas ! " she said , " alas !

column1: #Text=" Our talk , " I said , " has done me good . "
#Text=WILL THE BEST PEOPLE RECEIVE THE SUPERMAN SOCIALLY ?
#Text=WE'VE been taking up Metabolism lately -- our Little Group of Serious Thinkers , you know -- and it 's wonderful ; just simply WONDERFUL !
#Text=I really do n't know how I got along for so many years without it -- it opens up such new vistas , does n't it ?
#Text=I can never think in the same way again about even the most trivial things since I have learned all about Protoplasm and -- and -- well , all these marvelous scientific things , you know .
